refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The GTK+ type system is extensible. Because of that, types have to be managed at runtime.

refsect2.title: GtkType
refsect2.para: GtkType is unique integer identifying the type. The guts of the information about the type is held in a private struct named GtkTypeNode.

refsect2.title: GtkFundamentalType

warning.para: GtkFundamentalType is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: GtkFundamentalType is an enumerated type which lists all the possible fundamental types (e.g. char, uchar, int, long, float, etc).

refsect2.title: GTK_CLASS_NAME()

warning.para: GTK_CLASS_NAME is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. Use g_type_name() and G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS() instead.

refsect2.para: Returns the type name of class.

refsect2.title: GTK_CLASS_TYPE()

warning.para: GTK_CLASS_TYPE is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. Use G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS() instead.

refsect2.para: Returns the type of class.

refsect2.title: GTK_TYPE_IS_OBJECT()

warning.para: GTK_TYPE_IS_OBJECT is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. Use G_TYPE_IS_OBJECT() instead.

refsect2.para: Returns TRUE if type is a GTK_TYPE_OBJECT.

refsect2.title: GTK_TYPE_FUNDAMENTAL_LAST

warning.para: GTK_TYPE_FUNDAMENTAL_LAST is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. Use G_TYPE_LAST_RESERVED_FUNDAMENTAL - 1 instead.

refsect2.para: The highest-numbered structured or flat enumerated type value.

refsect2.title: GTK_TYPE_FUNDAMENTAL_MAX

warning.para: GTK_TYPE_FUNDAMENTAL_MAX is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. Use G_TYPE_FUNDAMENTAL_MAX instead.

refsect2.para: The maximum fundamental enumerated type value.

refsect2.title: GTK_STRUCT_OFFSET

warning.para: GTK_STRUCT_OFFSET is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. Use G_STRUCT_OFFSET() instead.

refsect2.para: Use in place of offsetof(), which is used if it exists.

refsect2.title: GTK_CHECK_CAST
refsect2.para: Casts the object in tobj into cast. If G_DISABLE_CAST_CHECKS is defined, just cast it. Otherwise, check to see if we can cast tobj into a cast.

refsect2.title: GTK_CHECK_CLASS_CAST
refsect2.para: Casts the object in tobj into cast. If G_DISABLE_CAST_CHECKS is defined, just cast it. Otherwise, check to see if we can cast tobj into a cast.

refsect2.title: GTK_CHECK_TYPE
refsect2.para: Determines whether type_object is a type of otype.

refsect2.title: GTK_CHECK_CLASS_TYPE
refsect2.para: Determines whether type_class is a type of otype.

refsect2.title: GTK_CHECK_GET_CLASS
refsect2.para: Gets the class of tobj.

refsect2.title: GTK_FUNDAMENTAL_TYPE

warning.para: GTK_FUNDAMENTAL_TYPE is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Converts a GTK+ type into a fundamental type.

refsect2.title: GTK_SIGNAL_FUNC()
refsect2.para: Just a macroized cast into a GtkSignalFunc.

refsect2.title: GtkClassInitFunc

warning.para: GtkClassInitFunc is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Defines a function pointer.

refsect2.title: GtkObjectInitFunc

warning.para: GtkObjectInitFunc is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Defines a function pointer.

refsect2.title: GtkSignalFunc ()
refsect2.para: Defines a function pointer.

refsect2.title: GtkFunction ()
refsect2.para: Defines a function pointer.

refsect2.title: GtkDestroyNotify ()
refsect2.para: Defines a function pointer.

refsect2.title: GtkCallbackMarshal ()
refsect2.programlisting: void (*GtkCallbackMarshal) (GtkObject *object, gpointer data, guint n_args, GtkArg *args);
refsect2.para: Defines a function pointer.

refsect2.title: GtkSignalMarshaller

warning.para: GtkSignalMarshaller is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Defines a function pointer.

refsect2.title: GtkTypeObject

warning.para: GtkTypeObject is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: A GtkTypeObject defines the minimum structure requirements for type instances. Type instances returned from gtk_type_new() and initialized through a GtkObjectInitFunc need to directly inherit from this structure or at least copy its fields one by one.

refsect2.title: struct GtkArg

warning.para: GtkArg is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This is a structure that we use to pass in typed values (and names).

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_CHAR()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_CHAR is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_CHAR.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_UCHAR()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_UCHAR is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_UCHAR.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_BOOL()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_BOOL is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_BOOL.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_INT()

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_INT.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_UINT()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_UINT is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_UINT.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_LONG()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_LONG is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_LONG.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_ULONG()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_ULONG is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_ULONG.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_FLOAT()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_FLOAT is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_FLOAT.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_DOUBLE()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_DOUBLE is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_DOUBLE.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_STRING()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_STRING is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_STRING.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_ENUM()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_ENUM is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_ENUM.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_FLAGS()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_FLAGS is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_FLAGS.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_BOXED()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_BOXED is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_BOXED.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_POINTER()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_POINTER is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_POINTER.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_OBJECT()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_OBJECT is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_OBJECT.

refsect2.title: GTK_VALUE_SIGNAL()

warning.para: GTK_VALUE_SIGNAL is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of a GtkArg whose GtkType is GTK_TYPE_SIGNAL.

refsect2.title: GTK_RETLOC_CHAR()

warning.para: GTK_RETLOC_CHAR is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: If the GtkArg contains a pointer to the value, this macro will be a pointer to a GTK_TYPE_CHAR.

refsect2.title: GTK_RETLOC_UCHAR()

warning.para: GTK_RETLOC_UCHAR is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: If the GtkArg contains a pointer to the value, this macro will be a pointer to a GTK_TYPE_UCHAR.

warning.para: GTK_RETLOC_BOOL is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: If the GtkArg contains a pointer to the value, this macro will be a pointer to a GTK_TYPE_BOOL.

refsect2.para: If the GtkArg contains a pointer to the value, this macro will be a pointer to a GTK_TYPE_INT.

refsect2.para: If the GtkArg contains a pointer to the value, this macro will be a pointer to a GTK_TYPE_UINT.

refsect2.para: If the GtkArg contains a pointer to the value, this macro will be a pointer to a GTK_TYPE_ULONG.

refsect2.para: If the GtkArg contains a pointer to the value, this macro will be a pointer to a GTK_TYPE_FLOAT.

refsect2.para: If the GtkArg contains a pointer to the value, this macro will be a pointer to a GTK_TYPE_DOUBLE.

refsect2.para: If the GtkArg contains a pointer to the value, this macro will be a pointer to a GTK_TYPE_STRING.

refsect2.para: If the GtkArg contains a pointer to the value, this macro will be a pointer to a GTK_TYPE_FLAGS.

refsect2.title: struct GtkTypeInfo

warning.para: GtkTypeInfo is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Holds information about the type. gtk_type_name() returns the name. object_size is somehow set to the number of bytes that an instance of the object will occupy. class_init_func holds the type's initialization function. object_init_func holds the initialization function for an instance of the object. reserved_1 is used for GtkEnumValue to hold the enumerated values.

refsect2.title: GtkTypeClass

warning.para: GtkTypeClass is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: The base structure for a GTK+ type. Every type inherits this as a base structure.

refsect2.title: GtkEnumValue

warning.para: GtkEnumValue is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: A structure which contains a single enum value, and its name, and its nickname.

warning.para: GtkFlagValue is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.title: gtk_type_init ()

warning.para: gtk_type_init is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Initializes the data structures associated with GTK+ types.

refsect2.title: gtk_type_unique ()

warning.para: gtk_type_unique is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Creates a new, unique type.

listitem.simpara: if zero, a fundamental type is created.

refsect2.title: gtk_type_name()

warning.para: gtk_type_name is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns a pointer to the name of a type, or NULL if it has none.

listitem.simpara: a pointer to the name of a type, or NULL if it has none.

refsect2.title: gtk_type_from_name()

warning.para: gtk_type_from_name is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the internal representation of a type, given its name.

listitem.simpara: the name of a GTK+ type

refsect2.title: gtk_type_parent()

warning.para: gtk_type_parent is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns the parent type of a GtkType.

refsect2.title: gtk_type_class ()
refsect2.para: Returns a pointer pointing to the class of type or NULL if there was any trouble identifying type. Initializes the class if necessary.

refsect2.title: gtk_type_new ()

warning.para: gtk_type_new is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Creates a new object of a given type, and return a pointer to it. Returns NULL if you give it an invalid type. It allocates the object out of the type's memory chunk if there is a memory chunk. The object has all the proper initializers called.

refsect2.title: gtk_type_is_a()

warning.para: gtk_type_is_a is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Looks in the type hierarchy to see if type has is_a_type among its ancestors. Do so with a simple lookup, not a loop.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if type is a is_a_type.

refsect2.title: gtk_type_enum_get_values ()

warning.para: gtk_type_enum_get_values is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: If enum_type has values, then return a pointer to all of them.

refsect2.title: gtk_type_flags_get_values ()

warning.para: gtk_type_flags_get_values is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: If flags_type has values, then return a pointer to all of them.

refsect2.title: gtk_type_enum_find_value ()

warning.para: gtk_type_enum_find_value is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns a pointer to one of enum_type's GtkEnumValues's whose name (or nickname) matches value_name.

refsect2.title: gtk_type_flags_find_value ()

warning.para: gtk_type_flags_find_value is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns a pointer to one of flag_type's GtkFlagValue's whose name (or nickname) matches value_name.
